item.title: Justin Guese
item.description: I, Justin GÃ¼se, am the founder of Datafortress.cloud. After working for Porsche Holding in an innovation/data science division, where I developed many projects ranging from Big Data to Virtual Reality (see portfolio), I decided to found my own company.
